mapper.sql: select id, supplier_sn, product_name, brand_name, product_code, first_category_name, secondary_category_name, third_category_name, supplier_spu_code, supplier_sku_code, spu_code, sku_code, product_spec, expiry_time, pack_unit, box_quantity, jd_price, jd_page_url, tmall_price, tmall_page_url, other_refer_price, selling_price, tax_cost_price, cost_price, tax_rate, stock, sales_desc, submit_time, supplier_invoice_type, not_delivery_range, supplier_settlement_price, shop_cost_price_base, memo1, memo2, memo3, memo4, memo5, create_time, update_time, first_category_id, secondary_category_id, third_category_id, refer_cost_price_base, is_uniform_price, refund_address, is_putaway_info_complete, putaway_enable, delivery_cycle, version, core_shop_putaway_status, remark, start_time, end_time, auth_state from product_info
